svg.text: Report Issue Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Report Issue
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
User reporting system allowing community members to report inappropriate content,
user behavior, or technical issues with category selection and admin alert generation.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active account
Main Flow:
1. User encounters inappropriate content, behavior, or technical issue
2. User clicks "Report" button on match, profile, or content item
3. System displays report form with category selection options
4. Categories include: Inappropriate Content, Harassment, Spam, Technical Issue
5. User selects appropriate category and subcategory if applicable
6. User provides detailed description of the issue or violation
7. System captures relevant context: reported item, timestamp, reporter ID
8. User submits report with confirmation of accuracy
9. System creates report record with unique ID and priority assignment
10. System sends immediate alert to admin moderation queue
11. System provides confirmation to user with report tracking number
Alternative Flows:
A1. Anonymous reporting: System allows reporting without revealing reporter identity
A2. Duplicate report: System detects and consolidates similar reports
A3. False reporting: System tracks report accuracy and flags malicious reporters
A4. Urgent report: High-priority reports trigger immediate admin notifications
A5. Report status: User can check report status and admin responses
A6. Cancel report: User can cancel report submission before final confirmation
